item.description:
Let's take advantage of Boston's best tasting brunch deal at Union's again. It's the early riser $9.95 special.
On Sundays, the special is ONLY available from 10 until 11. You're welcome to order from the regular menu.

Check out Union Brunch menu for the early riser special as well as a la carte options.

Driving and MBTA directions from Union link

MBTA:
Check out MBTA or Hop Stop to plan your public transportation route.

DRIVING DIRECTIONS:
Check out Google to plan your route

PARKING:
You should find free on street parking along Washington Street.

These MEMBER GUIDELINES were developed so our events run smoothly.

Please be considerate of your fellow diners time by arriving promptly so we can be seated together.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, tip, and tax.

All RSVP's are on a first come, first served basis.

You may only RSVP YES or NO. Maybe isn't an option.

Please RSVP YES only if you are certain you will attend.

If brunch is full and you wish to attend, please select WAIT LIST RSVP. When a spot opens, your RSVP will automatically be changed to YES based on the time of your WAIT LIST RSVP.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the event and you have not attended the event, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If I must change you're RSVP to NO because you haven't replied to final update event confirmation email deadline, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO within twenty-four hours of the event, without an explanation, it is counted as a NO-SHOW.

If you are a NO-SHOW for three events you are removed from the group.

NO-SHOWS impact everyone; from you, who could or has been on the wait list to the organizer as well as restaurant staffing.

If it is less than twenty-fours from the meal and you are not able to attend or are running late, you must text or call me on my cell (617) 445-7549

An email from you to me, Tonya explaining your absence is an expected courtesy.

If you are removed and there were extenuating circumstances, please email me about rejoining.

Your feedback is appreciated, so please, rate the event and venue by completing the post event survey.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for Tonya/Meetup reservation or call/text my cell (617) 445 7549

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Union - Final Twenty O Nine Brunch Sunday December 27th 10 AM
